#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	string A,B;
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	for (int i=1;i<=n;i++) {
		cin>>A>>B;
		bool done = false;
		int j=0;int k=0;
		while(j<=(A.length()-B.length())) {
			int temp1=j;int temp2=k;
			while (temp1<A.length() && temp2<B.length() && A[temp1]==B[temp2]) {
				temp1++;temp2++;
			}
			if (temp2 == B.length()) {
				printf("1\n");
				done = true;
				break;
			}
			j=j+1;
		}
		if (!done) {
			printf("0\n");
		}
	}
}
